errors.error_description: Placed virtual environment setup suggestion after pip install command instead of before it
correction_candidates: Move the virtual environment suggestion before the pip install command
Create a virtual environment first, then activate it before installing packages
Set up virtual environment after installing all system dependencies but before pip packages
Initialize virtual environment in a separate Dependencies section before package installation
errors.golden_answer: Move the virtual environment suggestion before the pip install command

errors.error_description: Missing installation instructions for z3 dependency
correction_candidates: Add installation command: pip install z3-solver
Add installation command: sudo apt-get install z3
Add installation command: conda install z3
Add installation command: python3 -m pip install z3
errors.golden_answer: Add installation command: pip install z3-solver
